see in.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to say that you do not know why someone likes someone else
see in.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I donâ€™t know what she sees in him.
see in.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to notice a particular quality in someone or something that makes you like them
see in.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He saw a gentleness in Susan.
see in.translation[0].definitions[2].def: to go with someone to make sure they arrive at a building or room
see in.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: He took her home and, after seeing her in, drove off without a word.
see in.translation[0].definitions[3].def: to celebrate the beginning of a new year
